SELECT TASK_NO, PRJCT_NO, TASK_NM, TASK_CN, TASK_BEGIN_DT, TASK_END_DT, TASK_DAYCNT, TASK_GRAD, PRIORT, TASK_STTUS, PROGRSRT, UPPER_TASK_NO, CHARGER_EMPNO, ATCH_FILE_NO, (SELECT EMPL_NM FROM EMPLOYEE E WHERE E.EMPL_NO = CHARGER_EMPNO) AS CHARGER_EMP_NM FROM PROJECT_TASK WHERE PRJCT_NO = #{prjctNo}
